thread.title: 'Awkward tension' between 'pitchy' Kerry Katona and Natasha Hamilton as Atomic Kitten reunite
thread.title_full: 'Awkward tension' between 'pitchy' Kerry Katona and Natasha Hamilton as Atomic Kitten reunite

author: Joshua Haigh
title: 'Awkward tension' between 'pitchy' Kerry Katona and Natasha Hamilton as Atomic Kitten reunite
text:
'Awkward tension' between 'pitchy' Kerry Katona and Natasha Hamilton as Atomic Kitten reunite The band took to the stage with Liberty X star Michelle Heaton Share The band performed in New Zealand Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Atomic Kitten reunited last night, but it seems like things aren't quite as good between the band as they used to be. 
With Liz McClarnon having a major fear of flying, the band was forced to ask Liberty X star Michelle Heaton to fill in. 
Joined by Natasha Hamilton and Kerry Katona, the threesome took to the stage to perform some of their biggest ever hits. 
As the group finished up their performance with a rendition of Whole Again, Kerry - who quit the band shortly after the track's release - said: "I was in the band then! So it's my number one too!" Atomic Kitten with Michelle Heaton Read More 
"It's everyone's number one," replied Natasha. 
According to reports, there was "awkward tension" between Kerry and Natasha throughout the band's set. The band are in New Zealand 
The odd vibe was apparently made worse when Kerry hit a few bum notes on the group's biggest smashes. 
The female trio of Jessica Taylor, Kelli Young and Michelle Heaton looked fierce as they performed at Auckland's ASB Theatre in skin tight outfits and towering heels. Liberty X disappointed fans (Photo: wonderwomanshel/Instagram) 
Fans were hard pushed to tell the difference between the threesome now and back in 2002 when they were formed out of the rejects of Popstars. 
One disappointed reviewer wrote: "The ladies proved they've still got it (and then some) but... you came all this way. And seemed super excited to be here. And we've waited 15 years for this. 
Mirror Celeb has reached out to Atomic Kitten's rep for comment. Like us on Facebook
